scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified. Run 'npm run benchmark:read' or 'npm run benchmark:write'" && exit 1
scripts.benchmark:read: caliper launch manager --caliper-workspace . --caliper-benchconfig benchmarks/config-read-test.yaml --caliper-networkconfig networks/test-network.yaml --caliper-report-path report-read-benchmark.html
scripts.benchmark:write: caliper launch manager --caliper-workspace . --caliper-benchconfig benchmarks/config-write-test.yaml --caliper-networkconfig networks/test-network.yaml --caliper-report-path report-write-benchmark.html
